message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item offers unparalleled value and functionality, making it an ideal choice for someone like yourself who appreciates quality and innovation. Given its unique features and the meticulous attention to detail, we believe it's worth more than $8000. However, I am extending a special offer to you today. For a limited time only, you can purchase this remarkable product for $9500. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or would like more information about the product, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.
